sentences.en: A : It's so different from Beijing cuisine and Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.cn: 川菜跟北京菜和广东菜非常不同.

sentences.en: A Let's go to the Cantonese restaurant in the hotel this evening.
sentences.cn: A咱们今晚去旅馆的广东餐厅去用餐.

sentences.en: But I feel a little bit embarrassed talking with the local people who speak Cantonese.
sentences.cn: 可是跟当地说广东话的人交谈我感到有一点困难.

sentences.en: Cantonese Chinese Sabbath School begins at 11:00 am in the Social Hall.
sentences.cn: 粤语(广东话)安息日学上午11:00开始在联谊厅举行.

sentences.en: Cantonese will be the main language used in the course.
sentences.cn: 所有运动课程将以粤语为主要沟通语言.

sentences.en: His family's Cantonese nickname for him translates as Never Sits Still.
sentences.cn: 家人为他起的广东话绰号意思是NeverSitsStill（从来坐不住）。

sentences.en: I mainly used the informal chinese ( cantonese ) in this web.
sentences.cn: 在那网站,我用了很多广东话式的通俗中文来发表内容!

sentences.en: I speak the Shanghai dialect, Szechuan dialect, Cantonese and, of course , Mandarin.
sentences.cn: 我会讲上海话 、 四川话 、 广东话和国语.

sentences.en: In this case, Cantonese and English people think the same.
sentences.cn: 在这个方面, 广州人和英国人的思维一模一样. (用同样的方式思考)

sentences.en: Lots to see and do, plus – I like Cantonese food.
sentences.cn: 很多可看的东西,很多可做的事情, 再加上我喜欢广东菜.

sentences.en: My sister speaks Cantonese very fluently.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐广州话说得很流利.

sentences.en: Our restaurant mainly serves Cantonese cuisine, including Chaozhou, Shantou and Hakka dishes.
sentences.cn: 本餐厅主要有粤菜, 包括潮汕菜和客家菜.

sentences.en: Therere some differences between Cantonese cuisine and Sichuan cuisine.
sentences.cn: 广东菜和四川菜有很多不同之处.

sentences.en: This article discusses the weak condition of the ba - sentences in Cantonese.
sentences.cn: 文章主要讨论粤语中的“把”字句的弱位状态.

sentences.en: To Zhuhai, I heard the Cantonese food is very particular about the.
sentences.cn: 来珠海之前, 我就听说广东人在吃的方面是很讲究的.

trans.tran_cn: 广东的，广东话的，广东人的，广东化的
trans.tran_en: Cantonese means belonging or relating to the city of Canton or Guangdong province
a Chinese language spoken in Southern China
a Chinese language spoken in Southern China

trans.tran_cn: 广东人（的）；广州人（的）; 广东话（的）
trans.tran_en: of or relating to people who speak Cantonese, or their language or culture
